definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
to be defeated/to lose/to fail (e.g. experiments)/failure/defeat/CL:次[ci4]
lapse/mistake/to make a mistake/fault/service fault (in volleyball, tennis etc)
(of soil etc) to wash away/to be eroded/(fig.) (of talented staff, followers of a religious faith, investment funds etc) to go elsewhere/to fail to be retained

sentences.english: Purpose To study limb immobilization influencing on denervated muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 結論肢體制動加速了失神經支配肌肉萎縮的發展。

sentences.english: This patient developed severe hepatitis with hepatic decompensation.
sentences.chinese: 該例患者患了重症肝炎，肝臟失代償。

sentences.english: The most regrettable and Qu doesn't is to lose, but have, didn't cherish well.
sentences.chinese: 最遺憾啲並吥是失呿，而是擁有時，沒有好好珍惜。

sentences.english: Ultra-low distortion at extreme sound pressure levels.
sentences.chinese: 超低失真的極端聲壓級。

sentences.english: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be seasoned?
sentences.chinese: 鹽本來是好的，但如果失了味，怎能使它再鹹呢？

sentences.english: This firmware version corrects distortion that can occur in high-speed burst pictures.
sentences.chinese: 修正在高速連拍時會發生失真的情況。

sentences.english: Fathers do not embitter your children, or they will become discouraged.
sentences.chinese: 你們做父親的，不要惹兒女的氣，恐怕他們失了志氣。

sentences.english: Failure meant a stripping away of the inessential.
sentences.chinese: 失敗將那些非本質的東西都剝離了。

sentences.english: Gradually the archaeologists made the ancient site give up its secrets.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家們逐漸使古遺址失了神祕密感。

sentences.english: Lost roses, hand still lingering fragrance, cold sun, moon pillow too.
sentences.chinese: 失了玫瑰，手還有餘香，冷了陽光，枕得明月。

sentences.english: Aim To evaluate the effect of endoscopic balloon dilation for achalasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內鏡下氣囊擴張治療賁門失弛緩症的療效。

sentences.english: There is a missing forepaw cursory, there are acute water and waves back.
sentences.chinese: 走馬有個前蹄失，急水也有回頭浪。

sentences.english: I was 30 years old when I was diagnosed with achalasia.
sentences.chinese: 我30歲的時候，我被診斷爲賁門失弛緩症。

sentences.english: Success or failure, gain or loss must therefore depend upon man's own exertions.
sentences.chinese: 成或敗，得或失，依靠於人們自己的努力。

sentences.english: They coined the term achalasia, meaning failure to relax.
sentences.chinese: 他們創造了長期失弛緩症，這意味着沒有放鬆。

sentences.english: The improvement of intermodulation distortion with series negative feedback is given quantitatively.
sentences.chinese: 定量地給出了串聯負反饋對互調失真的改善程度。

definition: expert/scholar/mother earth/a type of green tea
ample/complete/hundred percent/a pure shade (of some color)
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
